Legal_Issue: Whether the RPD's decision to reject Avdullahi's refugee claim was based on reasonable grounds
Credibility_Assessment: RPD questioned Avdullahiâ€™s Ashkali ethnicity due to lack of documentation
Basis_of_Claim: Well-founded fear of persecution based on Ashkali ethnicity
Key_Factor_in_Determination: Ethnicity and personal risk despite general state protection
Application_Error: Failure to properly assess credibility and personal circumstances; assumption of general state protection without individual analysis
Review_Outcome: Judicial review allowed, case remitted for reconsideration
Evidence_Ignored: Available evidence supporting Ashkali ethnicity and context in Kosovo
Legal_Standard: Well-founded fear of persecution on grounds of race, religion, nationality, political opinion, or membership in a particular social group
Application_Factor: Membership in particular social group (Ashkali ethnicity)
Decision_Review_Issue: Unreasonable assessment of credibility and state protection
Outcome_of_Review: Remitted for reconsideration by a different panel
Cause_of_Refusal: Doubt about ethnicity and assumed state protection
Evidentiary_Issues: Lack of documentary proof of ethnicity, reliance on oral testimony
Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Judicial review challenging reasonableness of RPD decision
Procedural_Issue: Remittal due to errors in application of law and assessment
Omission_Type: Failure to analyze personal risk despite general safety in Kosovo
